availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William D. Ball (Carter County farmer and laborer)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer and laborer. Virginia native. Married to Cynthia Ball. Father of Ralph Ball, Walter M. Ball, William Ball, Frances J. Ball, Ann L. Ball, John Ball, and Marcus L. Ball. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Laborer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 215B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 266.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, District 4, p. 51A.
